title: One trick ponies should have ban immunity
body: Just played a horrible game with Cassiopeia after my one trick, Vladimir, was banned, I do not think this was not an accurate assessment of my personal skill because I had no other option. I think your most played champion should have ban immunity.

replies.body:
While I appreciate the idea of creating a discussion of OTPs and giving them some sort of leeway in queue... I do not believe your thread is going to lead anywhere and I don't think you're really interested in the discussion topic. With that said, I am going to lock this thread and ask that if you have an objection to please visit [Boards Moderation](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/7rtKBZLi-boards-moderation-discord-verification).

Thanks,

Galacius

It's a very accurate assessment of your personal skill: If someone bans your main then you play like trash.

Either branch out to deal with these situations, or pray they don't happen that often.
If you can't play other champions and aren't able to pick your champion, you should dodge out of courtesy to your fellow players.
you bring disgrace to the Chaos clan

LOL no.

Not sure if troll or new, but have a downvote in case anyone takes this seriously.

Riot cannot and will never ban a player for playing poorly.

Riot would only ban if you did a really toxic move like /mute all vlad jg with ghost smite and spending all game duo top just because cass was banned. 

One tricks don't need anymore ban immunity than they already have, its how they react after they don't get their one trick, simply sucking mechanically on a different champ is no different than somebody just sucking in general, its not like you're intentionally losing the game
